## Read in large file


```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
```

```{r}
ami <- st_read(
  "Data/parsed_data/percentage_between_80-120_AMI.geojson") %>%
  rename(pct_lt_80ami = perc_citizens_lower_than_80.ami,
    pct80_120ami = perc_citizens_betwee80..120.ami,
    pct_gt_120ami = perc_citizens_higher_than_120.ami) %>%
  select(OBJECTID, pct_lt_80ami, pct80_120ami, pct_gt_120ami) %>%
  st_set_geometry(NULL)

gen_entropy <- st_read(
  "Data/parsed_data/age_entropy.geojson")

parcels <- st_read("Data/parsed_data/pittsburgh_parcels_centroids.geojson") %>%
  select(OBJECTID) %>%
  left_join(ami)



st_write(parcels, dsn = "parcels.geojson")
```
